## TextureProperties interface

Properties of a Texture (https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextureProperties 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [flipY](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.flipy.md) | boolean | Flip texture vertically. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture.flipY. |
|  [magFilter](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.magfilter.md) | [MagFilter](./harp-datasource-protocol.magfilter.md) | Texture magnification filter. |
|  [minFilter](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.minfilter.md) | [MinFilter](./harp-datasource-protocol.minfilter.md) | Texture minification filter. |
|  [repeatU](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.repeatu.md) | number | Texture horizontal repetition rate. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture.repeat. |
|  [repeatV](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.repeatv.md) | number | Texture vertical repetition rate. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture.repeat. |
|  [wrapS](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.wraps.md) | [WrappingMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.wrappingmode.md) | Texture horizontal wrapping mode. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture.wrapS. |
|  [wrapT](./harp-datasource-protocol.textureproperties.wrapt.md) | [WrappingMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.wrappingmode.md) | Texture vertical wrapping mode. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/Texture.wrapT. |
